home.title: Dmitry Bond
home.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & Technical Consultant
home.description: I help businesses build robust, scalable web applications and provide technical consulting services.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies, cloud infrastructure, and system architecture. With years of experience in building scalable applications, I help businesses transform their ideas into reality through technology.

bookme.title: Schedule a Meeting
bookme.description: Choose a convenient time for our consultation. I'm available for technical discussions, project planning, and collaboration opportunities.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information in accordance with GDPR regulations.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content: These terms govern your use of our services and website.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.content: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze website traffic.

banner.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience and analyze website traffic.
